Pre-Game Insights: Oklahoma City Thunder (8-1) hosts Golden State Warriors (7-2) aiming to extend its four-game home winning streak.
The Thunder finished the 2023-24 season with a record of 57-25, 36-16 in Western Conference action, and 33-8 at home.
The Warriors went 46-36 overall and 26-26 in Western Conference play during the 2023-24 season.
The Warriors averaged 117.8 points per game last season, 48.6 in the paint, 16.2 off of turnovers, and 12.4 on fast breaks.
